content: MQS-SP-T seismic transversal connector Galvanized pre-assembled strut channel connector with FM approval for transversal seismic bracing of fire sprinkler pipes ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Maximum installation flexibility due to adjustable angle FM-approved system for bracing of fire sprinkler installations Meets U.S.A. National Fire Protection Association (NFPA) requirements for seismic braces Shear-off bolt heads make installation and inspection quicker and easier Fully pre-assembled connector with pivoting functionality for quicker, easier and flexible mounting Applications Seismic approved (FM) bracing of fire sprinkler pipes Building attachment component for longitudinal brace assembly For use in combination with MQS-SP pipe clamps and MQ modular support systems For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals: FM approved seismic sprinkler applications Diameter - D: 0.5 in Material composition: Connector: S275JR - DIN EN 10025, Channel plate: S275JR - DIN EN 10025, Baseplate: S355MC - DIN EN 10149-2, Bolt: Steel grade 8.8, Nut: Steel grade 8 Technical Data | Approvals | FM approved seismic sprinkler applications | Diameter - D | 0.5 in | Material composition | Connector: S275JR - DIN EN 10025, Channel plate: S275JR - DIN EN 10025, Baseplate: S355MC - DIN EN 10149-2, Bolt: Steel grade 8.8, Nut: Steel grade 8 | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) | Weight | 561 g ### ITEMS- 2188249 - Connector MQS-SP-T-1/2 Transverse - Package Size 10 pc
